text: The Remains (sometimes referred to as "Barry and the Remains") were a mid-1960s American garage rock group from Boston, Massachusetts, led by Barry Tashian. Although the Remains never achieved national success, they were very popular in New England, and were one of the opening acts on the The Beatles' final US tour in 1966. ==See also== *Face to Face *Y Kant Tori Read *T'Pau *Debbie Harry Category:American musical groups
title: The Remains (band)
